SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.rental.vehicle.dto

Class Response<T>

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.rental.vehicle.dto.Response<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the data included in the response

Author: Joel Georgie

public class Response<T> extends Object
The Response<T> class is a generic response wrapper used by the controller to encapsulate results, status codes, messages, and arbitrary data.

This promotes uniform handling of successful and error responses.
